summary: Relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.76.004, 23.76.006, 23.76.026, 23.76.032 and 23.84.025, and creating new Sections 23.47.007 and 23.50.015 in order to create a new phasing process for very large projects called Major Phased Developments.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
